DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective evaluate handle Mepitel® One use acute wound home care . Secondary objective evaluate comfort , conformability , stay-on ability , pain removal , transparency dress adverse event .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Evaluating Handling Mepitel® One Used Acute Wounds Home Care
DOC.detailed_description: The investigation design open , non-controlled , proof concept investigation . Subjects acute wound one centre include . Each subject follow week 3 week heal occurs earlier . All dressing change do accord clinical routine register dress log . Cover dress use need accord clinical routine . A total 10 subject enrol provide fulfil inclusion criterion none exclusion criterion sign date write informed consent . The subject consecutively allocate subject code . At baseline , subject characteristic register together subject status health , wound history wound status , wound characteristic current treatment wound . The following variable measure follow :
DOC.criteria: 1 . Acute wounds/burns 2 . Male female , 18 year , outpatient . 3 . Signed Informed Consent Form 1 . Wound size 21x24.5 cm 2 . Subject expect follow investigation procedure 3 .
